objects.text: Professional Fitness Training for All Ages
Ball Bearings System | Adjustable Length | Foam Grip Handles

product_details.name: Jump Rope, Tangle-Free Rapid Speed Jumping Rope Cable with Ball Bearings for Women, Men, and Kids, Adjustable Steel Jump Rope Workout with Foam Handles for Fitness, Home Exercise & Slim Body
product_details.description: Brand: Loocio. Target Audience: Kid, Adult. Special Feature: Ergonomic, Adjustable Length. Recommended Uses For Product: Speed, Endurance, Exercise and Fitness. Material: Alloy Steel, Polyvinyl Chlorine (PVC). Handle Material: Polyvinyl Chloride (PVC). Color: Black. Item Length: 280 Centimeters. Grip Material: Foam. Handle Diameter: 26 month. Item Package Dimensions L x W x H: 6.46 x 6.22 x 1.73 inches. Package Weight: 0.16 Kilograms. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 1.97 x 4.72 x 7.09 inches. Brand Name: Loocio. Part Number: Loocio. Style: 1 Pack. Size: 1.

banner_details:
This banner features a visually impactful fitness product advertisement for a jump rope. The background uses a dark radial gradient enhanced with subtle circular and red grid overlays, bringing a sense of motion and energy. The center showcases a realistic product image (id: `product_image`) of a black jump rope, drawing focus to the item. Bold, uppercase text (id: `heading`) at the top delivers a powerful message, supported by a sleek subheading (id: `subheading`) in red. Key product features (id: `description`) are listed in smaller white text. The pricing (id: `price`) is prominently placed in large bold white font against a red accent wave, supported by a bright call-to-action button (ids: `cta_button`, `cta`). The overall composition uses strong contrasts and geometric balance to guide the viewer's attention from top to bottom.

**Color Palette:**
- #1A1A1A (Deep Charcoal Black)
- #333333 (Dark Gray)
- #E60000 (Vibrant Red)
- #FFFFFF (Pure White)
- #444444 (Soft Gray for grid lines)
product_color: The product image features a sleek, modern jump rope with a strong black aesthetic. The primary color is matte black (#1C1C1C), used on the handles and rope, giving a bold and minimalistic look. Glossy black accents (#0A0A0A) enhance the geometric ends of the handles, adding a reflective contrast and depth. Subtle shading and gradients blend the blacks for a smooth three-dimensional effect while still highlighting the grooves and texture of the handles. A steel gray (#4B4B4B) tint is seen on the cable for metallic detailing. This monochromatic, high-contrast palette is ideal for dynamic, fitness-themed advertisement banners.
